name: Dauphine Organics - NatCera™ Advanced Ceramide Complex
description: Dauphine Organics offers NatCera™ Advanced Ceramide Complex (V), a plant-based, skin-identical vegan formulation that restores and strengthens the natural barrier. This vegan ceramide complex provides complete barrier support while meeting natural and vegan cosmetic requirements.
notes: NatCera™ branded ingredient emphasizes natural and vegan credentials. Plant-based, skin-identical formulation meets growing demand for vegan cosmetics. Advanced complex provides complete barrier support without animal-derived ingredients.
